!pip install twilio
!pip install beautifulsoup4

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import requests
import json
import time
from twilio.rest import Client 
 

price_list=[]
def tracker(TrackingPrice):
    url='https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/dogecoin/'
    coin_market = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(coin_market.content, 'html.parser')
    try:
        price = soup.find("div",{"class":"priceValue___11gHJ"}).get_text().replace("$","").replace(",","").strip()
        price_float = float(price)
        if price_float<=TrackingPrice:
            price_list.append("Current price of DogeCoin is ${}".format(price_float))
            account_sid = 'YOUR_TWILIO_ACCOUNT_ID' 
            auth_token = 'YOUR_TWILIO_AUTHTOKEN' 
            client = Client(account_sid, auth_token) 
 
            message = client.messages.create( 
                              from_='whatsapp:+14155238886',  
                              body=price_list,      
                              to='whatsapp:YOUR_WHATSAPP_NUMBER' 
                          ) 
            print(message.sid)
        else:
            price_list.append("Couldn't get details about DogeCoin")    
    except:
        price_list.append("DogeCoin is out of budget")

TrackingPrice=0.27
tracker(TrackingPrice)
